edu.stanford.folding.msmexplorer
Class MSMExplorer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  edu.stanford.folding.msmexplorer.MSMExplorer
All Implemented Interfaces:
MSMConstants, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public final class MSMExplorer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements MSMConstants

Class to execute MSMExplorer, a visualization module for protein folding Markov State Models generated with MSMBuilder. Built on GraphView framework by Jeffrey Heer.

See Also:
Serialized Form

setHierarchy

public void setHierarchy(HierarchyBundle hb,
                         int pos)
Open the array of graphs gs as a related hierarchy. Initializes slider to switch between levels of the hierarchy.

Parameters:
gs -
pos -

setAggregates

public void setAggregates(int bottom,
                          int top)
Can only be called on a MSMExplorer instance that already has its own hierarchy list. Displays the aggregate graph that represents the mapping from the graph at position bottom to the graph at position top. Should only be called after already initing a MSMExplorer instance displaying the graph at hierarchy position bottom

Parameters:
bottom -
top -
